actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 4720, pursuant to the order of May 8, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4720, pursuant to the order of May 8, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 123.
Cloture motion on Amendment SA 4720 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 4720 proposed by Senator McConnell to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3851) Of a perfecting nature.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4720, pursuant to the order of May 8, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 123.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4720, pursuant to the order of May 8, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 123.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4720 proposed by Senator McConnell to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 4707.
